mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.sex AS "sex", a.idcard AS "idcard", a.tel AS "tel", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.homeaddress AS "homeAddress"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coach( id, name, sex, idcard, tel, birthday, homeaddress ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{idcard}, #{tel}, #{birthday}, #{homeAddress} )
mapper.update: UPDATE coach SET name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, idcard = #{idcard}, tel = #{tel}, birthday = #{birthday}, homeaddress = #{homeAddress} WHERE id = #{id}
